thread.title: Enjoin Names Dr. James Fee as Chief Executive Officer

author: cnbc.com
title: Enjoin Names Dr. James Fee as Chief Executive Officer
text:
COLLIERVILLE, Tenn., Feb. 6, 2018­ /PRNewswire/ -- Enjoin , a physician-led clinical documentation integrity company, announced today the appointment of James Fee, M.D., CCS, CCDS, to Chief Executive Officer.
Dr. Fee is formerly vice president of Enjoin who has been with the company since 2012. His 12-year healthcare career is distinguished by his achievements in both clinical practice and clinical documentation integrity (CDI) consulting and organizational strategy and management.
"James is an outstanding leader and the right fit to spearhead our 2018 strategic growth plans and renewed commitment to servicing our clients as stewards of coding and documentation integrity through education and program development," said Garry L. Huff, M.D., CCS, CCDS, President of Enjoin. "Enjoin is a nationally recognized brand of excellence and thought leadership in CDI. Our focus centers on the patient rather than the place of service—now especially critical as we help clients drive improved outcomes through population health management initiatives."
Huff will remain as President of Enjoin and work closely with Dr. Fee to advance Enjoin's mission of providing education and process development to ensure the clinical reliability and integrity of healthcare data. In his new position as CEO, Dr. Fee will forge new customer partnerships and bring innovation to providers facing critical challenges and decisions in health reform.
"I am honored to lead Enjoin during a time of great change and opportunities spurred by value-based care programs," said Dr. Fee. "We're truly moving the needle forward helping organizations create new operational models of success through precise documentation and coding. I'm excited to sustain and build upon our organization's performance."
Dr. Fee is board certified in internal medicine and pediatrics and maintains a clinical practice in hospital medicine. He has extensive experience in MS-DRG management and clinical documentation improvement. Dr. Fee works closely with providers participating in value-based reimbursement models, including risk adjustment and quality measure reviews in inpatient and ambulatory settings.
J ournalists: Click here to download Dr. James Fee's photo.
About Enjoin
With thirty years of direct physician leadership, Enjoin ensures evidenced-based care is accurately reflected through precise documentation and coding for value-based reimbursement. Enjoin clients achieve a demonstrable improvement in CMI, coding accuracy, quality metrics, risk adjustment and physician alignment. For more information, visit enjoincdi.com .
